description: React component for rendering a list of work orders with status indicators, progress bars, and action buttons.

methods.name: WorkOrderList
methods.description: React functional component rendering a responsive grid of work order cards with status, progress, and actions.

methods.name: statusColor
methods.description: Determines the color of the status chip based on work order status.

methods.name: actionsFor
methods.description: Returns the list of action buttons based on the current work order status.
